item.description:
Mark your calendars! I am announcing the date early so members can plan ahead for the meeting. Target attendance is 50 members.

Proposed agenda:

6:00-6:30 Welcome and Introductions
6:30-6:50 Networking Session I
6:50-7:10 Sid Falthzik - What Do You Do After You Say Goodbye?
7:10-7:40 Networking Session II
7:40-8:00 Boston Ecademy

I have put aside 50 minutes in two networking sessions to allow everyone adequate time to network with other attendees. Please bring plenty of business cards and get ready to meet some great people.

Also, take a few minutes to prepare your introduction. That is everyone's first impression of you and if you've read "Blink" by Malcolm Gladwell, you know we all make judgements in the first 8 seconds we meet someone. Make sure you deliver a memorable introduction.

We will be serving light refreshments for the evening.

Members who RSVP by 4/20 & bring guest $3.00
Members who RSVP by 4/20 without guest $6.00
Members who do not RSVP by 4/20 & bring guest $6.00
Members who do not RSVP by 4/20 without guest $9.00
Non-members who do not RSVP 4/20 $12.00

It is free to RSVP, just signup on Meetup and join Boston Ecademy here and you will save money at all future meetings.

You may also join Boston Ecademy over at www.ecademy.com, but to RSVP you have to do so here.


Thanks
- Phil

For directions, use the following link:

http://www.pedestalso...

For more information, see http://www.ecademy.co...
item.name: Boston Ecademy April Meetup
